definitions.definition: The act of one that understands or comprehends ; the mental process of discernment of meaning .
examples: There are certain things that defy human understanding .

definitions.definition: Reason or intelligence ; ability to grasp the full meaning of knowledge ; ability to infer .
examples: She has a solid understanding of particle physics.
According to my understanding , the situation is quite perilous. I wonder if you see it this way, too.

definitions.definition: An agreement of minds ; harmony ; something mutually understood or agreed upon.

subdefinitions.definition: An informal contract ; a mutual agreement .
examples: I thought we had an understanding - you do the dishes, and I throw the trash.
The parties of the negotiation have managed to come to an understanding .
He showed much understanding for my problems when he heard about my past.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The act of one that understands or comprehends ; the mental process of discernment of meaning .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Reason or intelligence ; ability to grasp the full meaning of knowledge ; ability to infer .
( countable ) An agreement of minds ; harmony ; something mutually understood or agreed upon.
